Event.name: Historic_event
Event.definition:
<def-root>In the course of history, an <fen>Event</fen> or <fen>Entity</fen> is taken to have importance or significance.
<ex>Throughout the campaign <fex name="Entity">activists</fex> have <t>made</t> <fex name="dom">financial</fex> <t>history</t> <fex name="Time">as one by one major corporations have yielded to protester power</fex></ex>
<ex><fex name="Event">The conference</fex> <m>was</m> <t>historic</t> <fex name="Entity">for Atlanta's growth as a city</fex>.</ex>
<ex>Many of the <t>historic</t> <fex name="Ent">sites</fex> offer additional outdoor recreation activities.</ex>
<ex>The James River is arguably the most <t>historic</t> <fex name="Ent">river</fex> in the country and one of the most important rivers in the Southeast.</ex>
<ex>Take in the <t><fex name="Ent">history</fex></t>, the sawdust-covered floors, and the legendary backroom where the ale flowed during Prohibition.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Event
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the event which occurs to create history.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies where the event takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the time when the event occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Explanation</fen> for which an event occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Entity
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the entity, concrete or abstract.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (quietly, loudly) and general descriptions comparing events (the same way).</def-root>

Arg.name: Domain
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Domain</fen> is (a characterization of) the type of event that is part of the <fen>Event</fen>'s history.
<ex>Throughout the campaign activists have <t>made</t> <fex name="dom">financial</fex> <t>history</t> as one by one major corporations have yielded to protester power</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This frame element selects some gradable attribute and modifies the expected value for it.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: historic.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: famous or important in history, or potentially so.

lexUnit.name: make history.idio
lexUnit.definition: FN: participate in a historical event.

lexUnit.name: historic [entity].a
lexUnit.definition: FN: pertaining to entities that have historic significance.
